title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: May 31, 2023, 01:20:42 AMLast edit: June 01, 2023, 02:38:36 AM by MoparMiningLLC
content: I present the Playtoshi Final update:, bitcoiner24h was not going to allow coldkey to kill PLAYTOSHI, now it will be PLAYTOSHI who kills coldkey All owners who have 1 Playtoshi will receive 1 free ballet card as a replacement (the coldkey card can be burned or destroyed, nobody cares, it is no longer part of the Playtoshi collection)If you own a Playtoshi Send Private message to MoparMiningLLC (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=1478835) with proof of possession of Playtoshi (the official auction will also be verified) You will only have to pay the shipping costs to receive your Ballet Playtoshi Card. Each Ballet playtoshi card owner is responsible for financing their card. The Playtoshi collection consists of- 50 Playtoshi Ballet cards.- 1 Bitcoin Stamp with the numbering: #18469 (supply 50) one in each Ballet card.¬†Stamps on the Bitcoin chain for all the eternityhttps://stampchain.io/asset.html?asset=A6081544777038959624------------------------------------------------------------TO CLARIFY:- Ballet Playtoshi Card number #1 to #21 the collection contains: 1 Ballet Card + 1 Bitcoin Stamp #18469 + 1 Playtoshi Toy (Source Toy https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5386316.0)¬†ALREADY SOLD- Ballet Playtoshi Card number #22 to #50 the collection contains: 1 Ballet Card + 1 Bitcoin Stamp #18469 ----------------------------------------------------------------------Soon the Playtoshi Ballet cards #22 to #39 ¬†will be auctioned in another Thread.Thank you all for supporting Playtoshi.
